scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir res && cd ..
scripts.prebuild-noclean: npm run copy-art && npm run copy-special
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run prebuild-noclean
scripts.run: npm run prebuild && parcel src/index.html src/games.html src/art.html
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build-only
scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && git clone https://github.com/BluebsTopCat/FruitBasketGames.git && cd FruitBasketGames && git checkout gh-pages && cd .. && mv FruitBasketGames dist && mkdir gitsave && mv dist/.git gitsave/ && rm -r dist/* && mv gitsave/.git dist/ && rm -d gitsave && npm run prebuild-noclean && npm run build-only && npm run gen-cname && cd dist && git add -A && git commit -m "deploy" && git push origin gh-pages
